mapper.select: SELECT B.ID, B.TITLE, B.WRITER_ID, B.CONTENT, B.REGDATE, B.HIT, B.FILES, B.PUB FROM (SELECT ROWNUM SEQ, A.* FROM (SELECT * FROM NOTICE WHERE ${field} like '%${query}%' ORDER BY REGDATE DESC) A ) B WHERE B.SEQ BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end}
SELECT count(*) cnt FROM NOTICE WHERE ${field} like '%${query}%' ORDER BY REGDATE DESC;
